abstract: Sanofi-Aventis says it has wrapped up its exchange offer for all Genzyme shares, an offer that expired just before midnight on Friday.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis says it has wrapped up its exchange offer for all Genzyme shares, an offer that expired just before midnight on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis said on Monday that it had wrapped up its exchange offer for all Genzyme shares, an offer that expired just before midnight on Friday.

headline.main: Sanofi Wraps Up Its Genzyme Offer
